sentence: 3 |||  ||| 0.3 ||| Methods We randomly assigned 12,562 patients who had presented within 24 hours after the onset of symptoms to receive clopidogrel (300 mg immediately, followed by 75 mg once daily) (6259 patients) or placebo (6303 patients) in addition to aspirin for 3 to 12 months.

sentence: 101 ||| DISCUSSION ||| 6.1 ||| Our study demonstrates the benefit of adding clopidogrel to the regimen of treatment for patients with acute coronary syndromes without ST-segment elevation who are receiving aspirin and other medications.

sentence: 14 ||| Conclusions ||| 2.3 ||| In patients who are undergoing percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty (PTCA) with stenting, shortterm aspirin treatment plus a thienopyridine derivative results in a substantially lower rate of myocardial infarction than does either aspirin alone or warfarin.

sentence: 126 ||| DISCUSSION ||| 6.26 ||| In summary, clopidogrel significantly reduces the risk of the composite outcome of death from cardiovascular causes, nonfatal myocardial infarction, or stroke, as well as a range of related ischemic events.
